result.title: Report on investments in flexibility options considering different market designs
result.description: This deliverable contains the market design options, which are already implemented in some countries or proposed for the European electricity markets and which will be assessed by the agent-based simulation. The report addresses the ability of different market designs to boost the introduction of flexibility options into the electricity market. It addresses also the question about the contribution of flexibility options to the security of supply under different market designs. Related to task T5.2 and T5.3.
